posts.post_content:
Posted By: Joe D.
Recently obtained a 1860s baseball stereoview... 

which is now leading me to try to obtain other 19th Century baseball photos.


Anybody have a baseball tintype available?  

It doesn't have to be pro-baseball, just baseball themed.


Thanks,
Joe

Posted By: Jimmy Leiderman
Joe, email sent.

Posted By: Joe D.
Jimmy,

I didn't receive an email.

Joe

Posted By: barrysloate
Joe- if you haven't already picked up a tintype I have a full team with equipment showing which I would be willing to sell. Unfortunately, my scanner is not currently working. I could make you a color photocopy tomorrow and mail it. If interested, please contact me at bsloate@att.net. Thanks, Barry Sloate
